DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether successful perinatal depression intervention among mother ( Thinking Healthy Programme , THP ) lead improved developmental outcome child 6 year later . Economic human resource aspect intervention also evaluate determine overall societal benefit investment program , feasibility scale intervention sustainability long-term . The primary hypothesis child mother participate THP well cognitive outcome socio-emotional functioning compare child mother randomize control group .
DOC.criteria: child woman eligible participate Thinking Healthy Programme developmental disability , visual hearing impairment
